content: How do I make an event affiliated with the DNC for the campaign? Can a business also profit from the event, or does it need to solely benefit the DNC?

Campaign finance laws are very strict and don't allow cross fundraising between separate campaigns or non-DNC official events. They can't be posted anywhere on the server. See rule 3 or our<#1242252810561654925>. You can submit an event on https://events.democrats.org but they also have guidelines there for what can be approved. All of this is governed by campaign finance law.
Thank you, I'll look at what is required and try from there!
